Posts.Content: Apr 22, 2009 07:40AM Debs-husband wrote: I have a few that do it for me: - Don't Take the Girl (Tim McGraw), - Jesus, Take The Wheel (Carrie Underwood), and - Remember When (Alan Jackson).  The funny part is - I didn't really grow up liking country (was more of an alt music punk as a teenager).  I guess I've grown up.  All of these songs have really done it for me over the past few years. Also, sadly, I'm pulling these and other songs together for my wife's (potential) funeral, since she's in hospice now.  Although on the up side, she's been doing better lately, so it may be far off.  We originally thought it would have been by now, but thankfully, she's still around and doing well.
Posts.Title: What Song Makes You Go Over The Edge? KellyC cp418
